Author: phmwls
Text: At first I used to get anxious if I got close to my ugw - Id get an insatiable hunger for and gain a pound. Then I got mega extra depressed and one day I was two pounds below it and I didn’t even care. Now weight is nothing to me as long as it’s the same or lower. But of course, I still don’t feel thin enough. I don’t think it’s about weight anymore, losing more would scare me a little since I’m not actively counting anything, just eating a lil, and bc going below that numbers place seems like a big no no.
